result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operator Flee/Elude Officer-Bodily Harm or Property Damage

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert L Kennedy Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Robert L Kennedy Jr in court.  Attorney Mark Stuart Tishberg in court for Robert L Kennedy Jr.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a State v. Lee hearing.  Attorney Mark Tishberg recently privately retained.  Court scheduled a status conference.  Court ordered defendant REINSTATED to Justice Point for LEVEL 5 SUPERVISION.  All previously ordered conditions of bail remain in effect.  Court informs Mr. Kennedy that an IN PERSON appearance is REQUIRED at the next court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Attorney Mark Tishberg

Adjustment Number: 22A 097842,
Payable Number: 1038613,
Receipt Number: 22RP041169,
Amount: $20.00
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Discharge Report 10-06-2022

Defendant Robert L Kennedy Jr in court in person.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Status Conference. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.
Hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert L Kennedy in court in person.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. SPD failed to appoint counsel. Case is adjourned.  Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for Status of Counsel.  Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Co-actor; Victims of the crash: J.R.C; A.T.M; T.M.G; P.K.M; C.L.P; Owner of the stolen vehicle driven by Defendant Kennedy J.K.Z.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  No driving without a valid license. Court order keep separate from co defendant while in custody.

Defendant Robert L Kennedy in court with attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs.  Defendant Robert L Kennedy in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert L Kennedy appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant has lower number case pending.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c5e6133e-7164-4e97-66e6-4c87ef70fbdb  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
